title: Tile Swap
description:
This is my second mobile game, created for the Play Store. The focus was to deliver a more polished experience by designing the entire game from start to finish and creating a complete product ready for publication. It is a simple puzzle game in which you click tiles to flip them and their direct neighbors. The goal was to turn the entire board into one color.

  • Programming
  • Game design
  • Sound design
  • Year: 2019
  • Platform: Android
  • Engine: Unity
